name: Creep Wars
description:
Creep Wars is a competitive tower defense game that pits you against an AI player.  You must protect your king from the creeps sent by your enemy, all the while sending your own creeps to overwhelm the enemy's defenses.

In Creep Wars, you build your own custom maze of towers to defend your king. The game is heavily inspired by the Warcraft 3 custom game Wintermaul Wars.

This game was made using the Godot engine as part of a 48-hour game jam with some other game developer friends.
